#summary A description of the Ontology Objects and their callable functions.

= Introduction =

A description of the Ontology Objects and their callable functions.
For any function listed below: Results may differ with jOWL.options.reason set to true or false.


= Details =

== Common Functions ==
{{{
.name;
}}}
the rdf:ID of the Object.

{{{
.label();
}}}
Returns a nicer representation name for this object, jOWL.options.locale sets the preferred language.

== Class ==
{{{
.parents();
}}}
Returns a jOWL Array containing this elements Parents.

{{{
.individuals();
}}}
Returns a jOWL Array containing this elements instantiations (individuals).
